short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily generate & decode QR codes from text, images, or clipboard. Drag, drop, save history, all ad-free for a seamless experience!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features

1. Core Functionality
   - Create QR codes from any text input.
   - Single-click to copy the generated QR code directly to the clipboard.
   - Command-click to download the QR code as an image file.
   - Enjoy an ad-free experience with no prompts for ratings, ensuring seamless usage.

2. History Management
   - Automatically save generated QR code history in local storage for easy access.
   - Conveniently export your QR code generation history into a JSON file for backup or transfer.
   - Effortlessly import QR code history from a JSON file to restore previous sessions.

3. QR Code Extraction
   - Drag and drop an image into the designated area to decode the QR code content.
   - Paste clipboard contents containing a QR code to instantly decode and display the embedded information.
